tool_description: Manages secure upload, validation, and storage of taxpayer documents including identity documents, financial statements, and supporting materials.
error_messages: Unsupported file format: Use one of [pdf, jpg, png, tiff]
File size exceeded: Maximum file size is 10MB per document
Invalid taxpayer ID: Taxpayer ID not found in system
Document type not recognized: Specify a valid document type
Upload failed: Document could not be processed due to corruption or security issues
usage: Provide taxpayer ID, document type, file format, and size. Optionally add description. Tool validates and securely stores the document with proper indexing.

document_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to uploaded document

storage_location.description: Secure storage reference for the document
